hero.title: Practice English with an AI Assistant by Phone
hero.subtitle: Improve your English speaking skills anytime, anywhere. Just make a call and start talking!

features.title: Why Practice with Speak on the Line?

availability.title: 24/7 Availability
availability.description: Practice at any time that suits your schedule. Our AI assistant is always ready to talk.

conversations.title: Natural Conversations
conversations.description: Our AI understands context and responds naturally, helping you build real-world conversation skills.

progress.title: Track Your Progress
progress.description: Improve with each conversation as you grow more comfortable expressing yourself in English.

step1.title: Make the Call
step1.description: Dial 0850 840 50 41 from any phone to connect with our AI assistant.

step2.title: Start Talking
step2.description: Speak naturally in English about any topic you'd like to practice.

step3.title: Practice & Improve
step3.description: Enjoy your conversation and build confidence with each call.

trial.title: Try 10 Minutes Free Today!
trial.description: Get started with a free 10-minute conversation. No credit card required, just dial and start practicing.
trial.comingSoon: Coming soon: Subscription packages and minute bundles for continued practice!

cost.question: How much does the service cost?
cost.answer: Currently, we offer a free 10-minute trial for every caller. Subscription packages will be available soon.

topics.question: What topics can I talk about?
topics.answer: You can discuss almost any topic you want! Our AI assistant can talk about daily life, hobbies, news, travel, technology, and more.

grammar.question: Does the AI assistant correct my grammar?
grammar.answer: Our AI focuses on maintaining natural conversation flow while providing subtle corrections and suggestions to improve your English.

international.question: Can I call from outside Turkey?
international.answer: Yes, you can call our number from any country. Standard international calling rates from your provider will apply.

footer.tagline: Improve your English speaking skills by phone.

modal.title: Get Started
modal.description: Ready to improve your English speaking skills? Call our number to get started with your free 10-minute trial.
